entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then clearing. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
